titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: The weather has again become beautiful. I completed the revision of the lecture, and delivered it to a considerable company in the Castle Hall at 5 p.m. Lord Durham, Col. Darwin, & a good many folks of the adjacent parts, were there. The delivery did not exceed 45 minutes.
